resources.string:
Area and perimeter calculator app for flat shapes such as square, rectangle, circle, and triangle.

This application is made for Assessment 1.

Copyright © 2024 Riffqi Dava Sundara.
All rights reserved.
A circle is a plane figure bounded by a single curved line, and such that all straight lines drawn from any given point in it to the bounding line, are equal.
Let\'s calculate the area and perimeter of the flat shape of your choice!
A rectangle is a two-dimensional flat that has four right angles and two pairs of equal and parallel sides.
A square is a two-dimensional flat shape that has four equal-length sides, four right angles, and four corners. A square is also called a quadrilateral or a 4-sided polygon.
A triangle is a flat shape that has three sides and three angles. Triangles can have the same or different lengths or sizes of sides and angles. But this time we will use equilateral triangles.
Rectangle length: %1$s cm\nRectangle width: %2$s cm\nRectangle area: %3$.2f cm²
Rectangle length: %1$s cm\nRectangle width: %2$s cm\nRectangle perimeter: %3$.2f cm
Triangle base %1$s cm\nTriangle height: %2$s cm\nTriangle area: %3$.2f cm²
